channel.title: [RichScape] Teleporting Screws Up Player Updates?
channel.description:
Here's a problem I've NEVER ran into before:
While trying to create a 'fun PK' area, I added a teleport to the area. Problem is, people in this area don't seem to be updating. They're 'invisible', and can usually only see you if they teleported to the area after you; but you can't see them. They can attack you, but obviously when they're invisible you can't attack back.
Any ideas why this would be happening?

item.title: [RichScape] Teleporting Screws Up Player Updates?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“dontreadthis, post:6, topic:269792”]If its a command, you add it as a new command like ::pkarea add a new command and after the commmand line just add in the toX and toY under it and it should teleport no problem…

If its a spell you click on, then add it in clciking most java as that button case…do the same ting with toY and stuff and yadayadayada

If your clicking on an item, well idk what source your using…

I have to go to sleep g’night…[/quote]I’m not having problem teleporting people… That works fine.

Once they’re teleported to where I’m teleporting them to, other players that are in the same area cannot be seen; they’re invisible.

Read full topic

If its a command, you add it as a new command like ::pkarea add a new command and after the commmand line just add in the toX and toY under it and it should teleport no problem…

If its a spell you click on, then add it in clciking most java as that button case…do the same ting with toY and stuff and yadayadayada

I have to go to sleep g’night…

@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“dontreadthis, post:4, topic:269792”]is this supposed to be a command, a magic spellbook teleport, or whatever?[/quote]I don’t really see how that’s relevant, but the method is called by a ‘button’ case.

Read full topic

item.title: [RichScape] Teleporting Screws Up Player Updates?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“dontreadthis, post:2, topic:269792”]Re-check your teleport method?..is it a non walkable area? Check and see if the area boundaries connect with some other content in the server…where is it at?[/quote]I’ve actually tried TWO different locations: The mage arena in high wild, and a part of the desert (which I’m attempting to do right now).

Non-walkable area: No. It’s the Shantay desert.

Teleport method:

public void teleportToZaroPK() { //teleportToX = 3283 + Misc.random(13); //teleportToY = 3071 + Misc.random(9); teleportToX = 3296; teleportToY = 3076; Send("This is a 'fun PK' area. You will NOT lose anything if you die."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
